rooms.description: A grandiose hall lined with white marble. A fifty feet golden statue stands at the northenmost section, with emerald eyes gleaming as if seeing farther than the present time.

get.message: You retrieve the eye from the golden statue. A cold shiver streams down your spine.

put.message: You place the emerald back into the golden statue's eye socket. The eye gleams intensely.

passages.description: A small roten wooden door retrofitted with an old brass handle.

objects.name: Emerald Eye
objects.description: The left emerald eye of the golden statue from the hall.
